metadata.name: Re: Item Chests Before Mother
metadata.description:
Doesn't this already exist? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2499739713]Yes[/url]
This mod requires REPENTOGON. It uses a newer Repentogon API that properly supports Guppy's Eye.
The room before Mother will contain 4 golden chests with treasure room items inside. If you have The Left Hand trinket then you'll get devil room items instead, and have to pay for them.
